column5: In 2015 this 2 bedroom 2 bath second floor condo was completely remodeled. It has a large balcony that overlooks the large complex pool. There is a path from the complex to the beach. It is tastefully furnished with granite counter tops, hickory cabinets, a fully furnished kitchen, linens and a large 46' flat screen TV. There are also extra perks like games and boogie boards for the kids and a large library of DVD's.   You will have everything you need for a great vacation !
column8: Complex is beachfront - Pool View Balcony
